column1: Traffic reports will resume Tuesday February 20 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for I-75S in Fayette Co (Northern Split Area):
column4: The right lane is blocked until further notice at the curve from I-75S to I-64E due to a semi that went off the roadway.

column3: Traffic Alert for I-75S in Fayette Co (Northern Split Area):
column4: Traffic is backed up past Exit 120 (Iron Works Pike).
